description: Houses repositories for scripture, knowledge, identity traits, and thematic mappings for relational engagement.

structure.purpose: Provides NovaAI with the knowledge and thematic context required for relational and spiritual systems.

key_subfolders.name: Bible
key_subfolders.description: Stores Biblical texts and modular references.

key_subfolders.name: Identity
key_subfolders.description: Tracks traits, emotional states, and relational insights.

key_subfolders.name: Themes
key_subfolders.description: Organizes thematic mappings for contextual understanding.

key_subfolders.name: Logs
key_subfolders.description: Maintains relational, runtime, and error logs.

anchored_in_faith.message: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

short_term: Ensure seamless integration of Bible.md with Themes and Identity.
Expand Themes with new contextual mappings.
long_term: Enable dynamic data retrieval across all subfolders.
Develop advanced linking between scripture and relational systems.

achievements.name: Data Architect
achievements.description: Optimized the folder structure for seamless integration.

achievements.name: Theme Builder
achievements.description: Added new thematic mappings to enhance relational intelligence.

achievements.name: Integration Specialist
achievements.description: Linked Identity traits to relational responses in SubNova.

dependencies.Core: Ensures data integrity during initialization and runtime.
dependencies.Systems: Provides foundational knowledge for relational, cognitive, and spiritual systems.

legal_information.ownership: This folder and its contents are protected as proprietary intellectual property under CreativeWorkzStudio LLC.
legal_information.purpose_statement: The Data folder serves as the repository of knowledge and thematic mappings, supporting NovaAI’s relational and spiritual systems.

credits.special_thanks: To God, for His unending guidance and blessings over this project.
